title: Tell me about a time when you bought new furniture.

korean: 지난달에 새 책상을 사러 가구점 간 게 기억나.
집에서 일하는 시간이 많아져서 좋은 책상이 필요했어.
가격, 크기, 디자인 다 비교해 봤지.
그런데 실제로 보고 사고 싶어서 매장에 갔어.
직원이 친절하게 여러 제품을 소개해 줬어.
높이 조절되는 책상이 좋을 것 같다고 추천해 줘서 그걸로 샀어.
서서 일할 수도 있고 앉아서 할 수도 있어서 편해.
배송비가 좀 나갔지만, 조립까지 해주니까 편했어.
배송 받는 날 직접 조립해 주고 테스트까지 해줬어.
좋은 가구는 오래 쓸 수 있으니까 투자할 만한 것 같아.
english: I remember going to a furniture store last month to buy a new desk.
I needed a good desk because I was working at home more often.
First, I searched for various options online.
I compared price, size, and design all.
But I wanted to see it in person before buying, so I went to the store.
The staff kindly introduced several products.
They recommended a height-adjustable desk would be good, so I bought that.
It's convenient because I can work standing or sitting.
The delivery fee was a bit expensive, but it was convenient because they assembled it.
On the delivery day, they assembled it directly and even tested it.
After using it, I'm really satisfied.
Good furniture can be used for a long time, so it seems worth investing in.
